thread.title: BRIEF-CyrusOne Says On April 20 & April 26 Co, CyrusOne Dutch, ZTL Seller Rep Entered Amendments To Sale & Purchase Agreement, Dated Dec 21

title: BRIEF-CyrusOne Says On April 20 & April 26 Co, CyrusOne Dutch, ZTL Seller Rep Entered Amendments To Sale & Purchase Agreement, Dated Dec 21
text:
Market News 52 AM / Updated 12 minutes ago BRIEF-CyrusOne Says On April 20 & April 26 Co, CyrusOne Dutch, ZTL Seller Rep Entered Amendments To Sale & Purchase Agreement, Dated Dec 21 Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
 CyrusOne Inc:
* CYRUSONE - ON APRIL 20 & APRIL 26 CO, CYRUSONE DUTCH, ZTL SELLER REP ENTERED AMENDMENTS TO SALE & PURCHASE AGREEMENT, DATED DEC 21, 2017
* CYRUSONE INC - PURSUANT TO AMENDMENTS PARTIES TO AGREEMENT AGREED TO EXTEND LONG STOP DATE TO MAY 18
* CYRUSONE - AFTER MAY 18 EITHER PURCHASER OR SELLERS MAY TERMINATE SALE & PURCHASE AGREEMENT IF GERMAN REGULATORY APPROVAL HAS NOT BEEN OBTAINED Source text: [ bit.ly/2I1ptEM ] Further company coverage:
